\n    \n    // function to find count of greater elements than val\n    public int greaterCount(List<Integer> list,int val){\n        int n=list.size();\n        int l = 0;\n        int r = n - 1;\n        int leftGreater = n;\n        while (l <= r) {\n            int m = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if (list.get(m) > val) {\n                leftGreater = m;\n                r = m - 1;\n
